title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us     Volunteer              Volunteer          Volunteer Opportunities  Volunteer.gov  Listed below are volunteer opportunities in this park that are currently listed on the Volunteer.gov website. You can look for opportunities on this website by zip code. The zip code for this park is 18324.   Volunteering with Partners  Park partners often have volunteer opportunities.  Volunteering with Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area  Volunteers who work over 250 hours can earn the inter-agency America the Beautiful Volunteer Pass. For more information on specific opportunities in this park for individuals or organizations, email the park's volunteer coordinator or call (570) 426-2443.  Â     Current Volunteer Opportunities
